description: Session 3 complete: Split 4 oversized files achieving 50% reduction (8→4 files remaining), completed fake test audit (fixed 1 placeholder test in test_watcher_patterns.py), added comprehensive TOON format migration plan to TODO.md (Priority 2.4, 30-60% token savings), analyzed Julie's three-mode TOON implementation (json/toon/auto with smart threshold), created detailed fast_search pilot plan with 7 phases and success metrics
